Package com.paiondata.aristotle.service

Interface GraphService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphServiceImpl
public interface GraphService
Service implementation for managing graphs. This class provides methods for CRUD operations on graphs and their relationships.

    • getGraphVOByUuid

      GraphVO getGraphVOByUuid(FilterQueryGraphDTO filterQueryGraphDTO)
      Retrieves a graph by its UUID and filter parameters.
      Parameters:
      filterQueryGraphDTO - the filter query DTO
      Returns:

      Deletes graphs by their UUIDs.

      Updates a graph using the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      graphUpdateDTO - the DTO containing details to update an existing graph
      tx - the Neo4j transaction
